description: [KadNode](http://github.com/mwarning/KadNode) delegates DNS requests (*.p2p) from any application and tries to resolve it using the BitTorrent Mainline DHT. Own addresses can be announced and combined with public/secret keys. KadNode can be used as a decentralized DynDNS system, but also covers many other use cases.
name: KadNode

ohloh.description:
P2P DNS and more.
KadNode uses the BitTorrent Mainline DHT to announce and resolve identifiers to IP addresses.
It delegates DNS requests of a choosen Top Level Domain (e.g. .p2p) from any application and tries to resolve it over the network. It can act as a decentralized DynDNS system, but also covers many other use cases.
ohloh.name: KadNode
